org.modelio.metamodel.experts.links

Class LinkTool.LinkExpertRegistry

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.modelio.metamodel.experts.links.LinkTool.LinkExpertRegistry
  • Enclosing class:
    LinkTool

    public class LinkTool.LinkExpertRegistry
extends Object
    Registry to get the expert for a given:
    • parent element metaclass.
    • link metaclass.
    • stereotype.
    • mobject
    Custom experts must implements ILinkExpert and be registered in the initialize() method.

    Stereotype creation experts can be added with registerExpert(Stereotype, ILinkExpert) and removed with unregisterExpert(Stereotype).

        public ILinkExpert getExpert(MClass metaclass)
        Get the creation expert for the given element.

        Get the creation expert for the given stereotype.
        Parameters:

        Returns:

        Returns:

        Parameters:

        expert - The creation expert.

      • unregisterExpert

        public void unregisterExpert(Stereotype ste)

        Parameters:
        ste - The stereotype to forget.
